properties.description: A warm welcome, hot and cold drinks, hot food, wifi, charging points and chat. There is no charge however nominal donations are welcome. We can help signpost to organisations for advice, information and guidance. The church is on bus routes R4, 10, 10A and 10B. If you have a question about this Warm Welcome Space, contact: Dave Charter 0191 460 6411 contact.rytonmethodist@gmail.com
properties.title: Ryton Methodist Church

properties.address: 80 Medomsley Road, Consett, County Durham DH8 5HS
properties.description: Our space is a warm, welcoming creative hub based inside the ArtTee Studio in Consett — designed for young people (especially those aged aged 12–17) who often feel excluded from traditional settings - we're talking the super quirky and creative kids who are more often than not SEND, LGBTQ+, neurodiverse and misunderstood. It’s colourful, cosy, and inclusive — with fairy lights, chill-out corners, music in the background, and shelves full of art supplies, journals, and sensory materials. It’s not a youth club — it’s a space for expression, belonging, and creative freedom. One corner might host quiet sketching or poetry writing, while another becomes a pop-up makeup tutorial or collaborative art piece. Whether someone comes to connect or just be, it’s a safe, accepting environment where difference is celebrated and imagination leads the way. It’s The GloHouse come to life — glowing, grounded, and built with purpose.
properties.title: The GloHouse @ ArtTee Studio
